NameType.title: Name
NameType.description: Captures the name of a malware instance or malware family and the relative confidence of the name.

value.description: Specifies the name of the malware instance or malware family.

source.description: Specifies the source of the value property (name).

confidence.description: Specifies the relative confidence in the accuracy of the assigned name. The values for this property is confidence-measure-ov.
